detail_desc: Lined, non-wired bikini top with a low-cut neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Long, double-breasted coat in a felted wool blend with wide notch lapels, welt side pockets, a tie belt at the waist and single back vent. Lined.
Captain’s cap in woven fabric with knots at the sides and braiding at the front. Lined.
Cotton piqué joggers with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams an appliqué on one leg, and wide ribbing at the hems.

prod_name: TD Roger eller TD Poplin 29 by
detail_desc: Shirt in premium cotton with a narrow turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Canvas trainers with lacing at the front and platform soles with a braided jute trim. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles. Platform 4 cm.

Jumpsuit in lightweight chiffon crêpe with a V-neck and wrapover at the front with a concealed press-stud. Elasticated seam at the waist, gently flared, 3/4-length sleeves, and glittery embroidery around the neckline, sleeves and hems. Lined.
V-neck T-shirt in cotton jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved blouse in patterned chiffon with a lace collar, concealed buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves, wide cuffs with a covered button, and a rounded hem.

Trainers in mesh with a lightly padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and ethylene-vinyl acetate (EVA) and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Plastic glasses with antlers, a red nose and clear plastic lenses.
Leggings in stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Non-wired, lace push-up bra with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Dungaree dress in washed, stretch cotton denim with decorative embroidery and adjustable straps with metal fasteners. Seam at the waist with buttons at the sides, patch front pockets and back pockets.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Short, high-waisted shorts in a viscose weave with pleats at the top, wide elastication at the back of the waist, and side pockets.
Hat in braided paper straw with a grosgrain band. Width of brim 3.5 cm.

Pyjamas with a strappy top and culottes in a soft, textured viscose weave. V-neck top with buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Ankle-length bottoms with an elasticated waist and straight, wide legs.
Sleeveless romper suit in soft, organic cotton jersey with narrow shoulder straps. Press-studs at the top and crotch and short legs with narrow ribbed trims.
Joggers in printed sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a ribbed, elasticated, drawstring waist. Side pockets, an open back pocket, and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shirts in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, an open chest pocket and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Easy-iron finish.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Small embroidery detail at the bottom of one sleeve.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Ankle-length cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, fake back pockets and slim legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is partly recycled.
Straight-style vest top in soft jersey with a round neckline and visible seam down the back.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Sports shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
Blouse in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Small, gathered stand-up collar, a V-neck opening and concealed buttons at the front and short, wide, raglan sleeves with ties.
Jumpsuit in organic cotton-blend sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood. Contrasting colour zip, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.

Rain jacket in wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed, waterproof seams and a detachable, fleece-lined hood with a peak. Zip down the front and elasticated cuffs. Fleece lining. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Suit waistcoat in a weave containing some linen with buttons down the front, fake welt front pockets and a sewn-on, decorative tab at the back. Lined.
Oversized jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Short dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with a slightly wider neckline that has gathers at the front and an opening with ties at the back. Flounces down the front that continue down the back, long dolman sleeves with narrow elastication and ties at the cuffs and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. V-neck jersey inner dress. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Short skater skirt in soft fabric. Unlined.
Two-strand necklace in metal with pendants. Adjustable length, 41-49 cm.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Round neckline with an opening and button at the back of the neck, yoke with flounces and long, wide sleeves with a button at the cuffs.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with a V-neck, cap sleeves and a wrapover front that fastens with a concealed press-stud and ties at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in stretch jersey with a wide neckline and gathers at the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Shirt jacket in rustly nylon with a turn-down collar, zip down the front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and flap chest pockets with press-studs. Unlined.
Shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with a flap and magnetic press-stud fastener. Lined in woven fabric made from recycled polyester.
Long cardigan in a soft, fine loose knit with slits at the hem and no fasteners. The polyester content of the cardigan is recycled.

Shirt in a viscose weave containing some linen with a resort collar, French front and short sleeves. Yoke at the back and a straight-cut hem. Relaxed fit – a straight fit with good room for movement creating a comfortable, relaxed silhouette.

Jacket in soft thermal fleece with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Leggings in washed, stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Cropped, double-layered sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section on one shoulder. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Long-sleeved top in soft pile with a motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Comes with a shoulder bag in soft cotton jersey with appliqués on the front, a hook and loop fastening at the top and a glittery shoulder strap.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave. Size 45x45 cm.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.

Short, fitted dress in crisp taffeta with a matt finish. Sweetheart neckline and gathered seams to create a dramatic effect. Short, voluminous puff sleeves with covered, gathered elastication at the shoulders and hems, and a concealed zip at the back with buttons at the top. Lined.
Longer hooded top in soft fleece with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft and fluffy inside.
Fine-knit socks in various designs with a fold-down shaft.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with narrow shoulder straps and a racer back with a decorative ring and narrow straps at the back. Elasticated hem. Light support.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Mesh-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, zipped side pockets and elasticated cuffs. Mesh lining.
Short shorts in a stretch weave with a high waist with pleats, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets and a fake welt back pocket.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with a round neck, concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Calf-length, fitted dress in ribbed jersey with short raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Round hat in braided paper straw. Width of brim approx. 4 cm. Cotton lining.
Boxy-style jumper in a jacquard knit with a soft, brushed finish. Long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short dungaree dress in stretch cotton corduroy with straps that fasten with buttons at the front, an open, frill-trimmed chest pocket and buttons at the sides.

Set with a top, pair of leggings and hat in soft cotton. Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, a press-stud on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Hat in double-layered jersey.

Single-breasted jacket in a textured weave made from a cotton blend with narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and imitation suede elbow patches. Chest pocket, flap front pockets and an inner pocket with a button. Fastening with two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Partly lined. Slim Fit – a fit that tapers at the chest and waist which, combined with slightly narrower sleeves, creates a fitted silhouette.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and covered elastication at the hems. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder top in patterned stretch jersey. Double layer at the top.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes with pendants. Diameter from 1.6 cm to 2.1 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Moisturising vanilla lip balm in a small, glittery plastic pot in the shape of a winged unicorn. 3 g.
Imitation leather sandals with a braided foot strap and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles. Heel 5 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. T-shirt top with a print motif. Shorts with an elasticated waist.
Recycled zinc ring in the shape of a snake encircling the finger. The snake’s head is decorated with glass rhinestones.
Straight-cut top in a crêpe weave with a V-neck and wide ties at the neck. The polyester content of the top is partly recycled.
Imitation suede loafers with imitation leather details, tassels at the top and a moccasin seam at the front. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.
